scripts.start: cd build && node back.js > ./back.log 2>&1 & electron . && kill -9 $(lsof -ti :3000)
scripts.test: cd build && node back.js > ./back.log 2>&1 & mocha -R xunit-file tests/spec.js && kill -9 $(lsof -ti :3000)
scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && mkdir ./build && tslint -c ./configs/tslint.json -p ./configs/tsconfig.json && webpack --mode development --config configs/webpack.config.js && cp -R ./back/specs/spec ./build/ && cp -R assets/* ./build/
